item.title: Visual studio code can't run in ubuntu, how to?
item.description: Root Cause: This problem is that VS Code uses Electron, which is the root cause of the bug. Fix: mkdir ~/lib cp /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libxcb.so.1 ~/lib sed -i ’s/BIG-REQUESTS/_IG-REQUESTS/’ ~/lib/libxcb.so.1 export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=~/lib && code [reference!]https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55802252/visual-studio-code-wont-open-on-ubuntu-16-04-via-vnc
